attributes.action: we want the police to take action against sex trafficking.
attributes.additional_details: we also want to make sure that survivors are getting the aftercare they need. This includes therapy and helping victims stay sober. This is because the traffickers get them addicted to drugs.
attributes.background: We need the government to fund the police so they can purchase proper resources into helping young men and women escape. We need them to put more effort and attention towards helping young girls and boys get out.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about policing are a matter for individual police forces, not the Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding to help tackle human trafficking, or aftercare for victims, if that's what you want to happen.

If you have information about a crime you should report this to the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-the-police/report-a-crime-incident/
